text:
Alta Motors | Brisbane, CA near SF| ONSITE | Full-time

We design, build & manufacture our Electric Motorcycles just south of San Francisco. We even manufacture our proprietary battery packs onsite. We are growing, building strategic partnerships and succeeding. Check us out at www.altamotors.co (not .com)

We're Hiring. Please use the appropriate links to apply ...

1) Linux Systems Admin - Software Engineer. To apply go to... https://grnh.se/359ea6d31 2) Systems Modeling Engineer. To apply ... https://grnh.se/80f1571e1 3) Structural Test Engineer. To apply ... https://grnh.se/1fdd02b31

There is always some exciting news, milestones reached, fast change / fast growth, always something to learn, and it's never boring. Great perks too ... employees can to commute on an Alta bike!
